bio: John Smith is a chef with 10 years of experience. He has created 50 recipes and has gained 10000 likes for his dishes.

ingredients: 1 (5 1/2 pound) corned beef brisket with spice packet
method: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Place corned beef brisket in the center of a roasting pan. Arrange potatoes and carrots around the sides, then scatter onion and garlic over top.
Roast in the preheated oven until corned beef is so tender it can be flaked apart with a fork, about 5 to 6 hours.
